body:
I had to provide two patches for this. One to fix the CMakeLists to enable a missing binary and installing of binaries. The second patch fixes a header to add a missing include and to fix a preprocessor error.

Percept requires `boost+exception` but that variant did not exist and I am not sure how to enable `boost+exception` besides putting it in the default libs.
title: Adding Percept and adding exception to Boost default libs
